entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued May 22 at 6:51AM AKDT until May 22 at 11:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR THE ANCHORAGE AREA... entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 10:20AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Webb County through 1115 AM CDT... At 1020 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of United South High School to 9 miles southeast of El Cenizo. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail.
